special_text:
Charim Kosta can crew Vehicles as though he was a creature with power equal to his loyalty.
[+1]: Exile the top two cards of your library. You may play one of them this turn.
[-1]: Create a 1/1 colorless Pilot creature token with “This creature crews Vehicles as though its power were 2 greater.”
[-6]: You get an emblem with “The first spell you cast each turn has affinity for artifacts.”
